vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 2Sa.23.9;
son of: Bela (H1106A);
brother of: Ard (H0714H), Naaman (H5283H), Ezbon (H0675H), Uzzi (H5813I), Uzziel (H5816I), Jerimoth (H3406), Iri (H5901), Addar (H0146H), Gera (H1617I), Abihud (H0031) and Abishua (H0050H); also called Ahoah at 1Ch.8.4;
Group of a.cho.ach (אֲחוֹחַ "Ahoah" H0265)
§ Ahohite = "brother of rest"
one of the clan of Ahoah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Ahóah; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞合人 这个形容詞在原文的意思是 "安息的兄弟"
亞合人的一個族系
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚合人 这个形容词在原文的意思是 "安息的兄弟"
亚合人的一个族系
